name: MoonFall (itch) (MrSunshine)
description:
Use flares to light your way to the moon's core in this short low-gravity platforming adventure.

Why are you descending into the moon? I don't know. Why are there flares everywhere? To drive off the rats.

Completed (and submitted 5 minutes before the deadline) for the utGDDC 2022 Fall Jam. Theme for this jam was "The Fall". 

Basic Input:
  • AD to move left and right
  • W to jump
  • Requires a mouse!

Music: https://nomys-tempar.itch.io/happy-rock-music-track

Assets were mixed and matched from different places with CC licenses. I wish I could credit but I did not keep track :,)
